name: pnp-sp-fx-aces-hidable-ace
title: Hidable ACE
shortDescription: This solution shows an example of how to hide an ACE based on a user action such as a button click.
longDescription: This solution shows an example of how to hide an ACE based on a user action such as a button click. This specific example stored the click data in local storage and checks a data time interval but can be updated to include any logic.
